dmca.title: [TP-C758134D] Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Friday, September 08, 2006 10:20 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [TP-C758134D] Copyright Violation Subject: [TP-C758134D] Copyright Violation From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [TP-C758134D] Copyright Violation Reference: [TP-C758134D] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Copyright Violation Added by system at Friday, Sep 8 2006 01:23 pm X-MailFrom: michaelmcd@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.181] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Fri Sep 8 13:22:57 2006 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 08 Sep 2006 13:22:57 -0500 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from michaelmcd@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GLl0C-0007kE-Sq for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Fri, 08 Sep 2006 13:22:56 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 8 Sep 2006 13:22:54 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from michaelmcd@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GLl0B-0007cF-A6 for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 08 Sep 2006 13:22:55 -0500 Received: from nf-out-0910.google.com ([64.233.182.184]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from michaelmcd@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GLl07-0007j6-QW for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 08 Sep 2006 13:22:52 -0500 Received: by nf-out-0910.google.com with SMTP id x30so706442nfb for ; Fri, 08 Sep 2006 11:22:49 -0700 (PDT) DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; q=dns; c=nofws; s=beta; d=gmail.com; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:cc:in-reply-to:mime-version:c ontent-type:references; b=QzsbCdZASURUldNC7SztDhjtjlQRo/T/r9qesfj6XvUkfAz/efDJM5WvSl3xyGpkmZIYYa kcmSC8FGlA+c3vDbIRkSIApBJJrwnxyYGfpmyfv2vl8ansBgwikR9HrBur92pz/aXSDgsqrB zZ35zd1SlD2mD7jkN3diOiE2fLQYM= Received: by 10.65.219.4 with SMTP id w4mr2657714qbq; Fri, 08 Sep 2006 11:22:48 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.64.209.3 with HTTP; Fri, 8 Sep 2006 11:22:48 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <63a747380609081122r57b8c530l1d29a6d0c5d4842f@mail.gmail.com> Date: Fri, 8 Sep 2006 14:22:48 -0400 From: "mike mcdonald" To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: Copyright Violation Cc: legal@theplanet.com In-Reply-To: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_186988_5425394.1157739768072" References: Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 64.233.182.184 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.182.184; envelope-from=michaelmcd@gmail.com; helo=nf-out-0910.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 08 Sep 2006 18:22:55.0026 (UTC) FILETIME=[CD926120:01C6D373] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) To Whom It May Concern; The owner/operator of one of your hosted sites continues to misuse copyrighted materials. Specifically, as illustrated below, your hosting client is altering/replacing the link structure of our copyrighted material. Your action in an identical matter (from the same host client - see TP-C505510N) was appreciated. However, this individual is repeating the same process on another domain hosted by your company and unfortunately requires additional attention. Clarification/required elements (as per Section 512(c)(3)): (i)A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. Michael McDonald Operations Manager iEntry, Inc 2549 Richmond Rd 2nd Floor Lexington, KY 40509 (ii)Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works at that site. http://www.webpronews.com/topnews/topnews/wpn-60-20060314MemeorandumExpa ndsToCoverGossip.html http://www.webpronews.com/topnews/topnews/wpn-60-20060317IsThereARightWa yToBuildBlogTraffic.html (iii)Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to locate the material. http://blogs.blogtorank.com/?p=1678 http://blogs.blogtorank.com/?p=2308 (iv)Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to contact the complaining party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may be contacted. Michael McDonald Operations Manager iEntry, Inc 2549 Richmond Rd 2nd Floor Lexington, KY 40509 Phone: 859-514-2720 Fax: 859-219-9065 email: mike@ientry.com (v)A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I have a good faith belief that the use of the material that appears on the service is not authorized by the copyright owner (iEntry, Inc), any agent of iEntry, Inc. , or by operation of law. (vi)A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. The information in this notice is accurate, and I am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner. That should substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). ThePlanet.com is hosting sites whos sole function is the dissemination and sale of software designed to exploit copyrighted materials. Specifically, this site/software is replacing link structures and/or altering/redirecting links within copyrighted materials. Thank you for your continued attention in this matter. -Michael McDonald MIME element (text/html)

To Whom It May Concern;

The owner/operator of one of your hosted sites continues to misuse copyrighted materials.  Specifically, as illustrated below, your hosting client is altering/replacing the link structure of our copyrighted material.  Your action in an identical matter (from the same host client - see TP-C505510N) was appreciated.  However, this individual is repeating the same process on another domain hosted by your company and unfortunately requires additional attention.

Clarification/required elements (as per Section 512(c)(3)):


(i)A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Michael McDonald
Operations Manager
iEntry, Inc
2549 Richmond Rd
2nd Floor
Lexington, KY 40509

(ii)Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works at that site.

http://www.webpronews.com/topnews/topnews/w pn-60-20060314MemeorandumExpandsToCoverGossip.html
http://www.webpronews.com/topnews/topnews/wpn-60-20060317IsThereARightWa yToBuildBlogTraffic.html

(iii)Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to locate the material.

http://blogs.blogtorank.com/? p=1678
http://blogs.blogtorank.com/?p=23 08

(iv)Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to contact the complaining party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may be contacted.


Michael McDonald
Operations Manager
iEntry, Inc
2549 Richmond Rd
2nd Floor
Lexington, KY 40509
Phone: 859-514-2720
Fax: 859-219-9065
email: mike@ientry.com

(v)A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I have a good faith belief that the use of the material that appears on the service is not authorized by the copyright owner (iEntry, Inc), any agent of iEntry, Inc. , or by operation of law.


(vi)A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

The information in this notice is accurate, and I am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner.



That should substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

ThePlanet.com is hosting sites whos sole function is the dissemination and sale of software designed to exploit copyrighted materials. Specifically, this site/software is replacing link structures and/or altering/redirecting links within copyrighted materials.


Thank you for your continued attention in this matter.

-Michael McDonald
MIME element (text/plain)
